pages.text: Your hands were shaking as you brought this idea onto paper. This is going to be big.$()$(br2)Producing Ink always was a tedious process: from collecting $(l:general/shards)Gemstone Shards$(/l), $(l:general/anvil_crushing)crushing them$(/l), $(l:general/colored_trees)creating trees$(/l) to cut them down again for their $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l), just to convert it into Ink in the $(l:magic/color_picker)Color Picker$(/l).$(br)$(italic)Time to cut out all these intermediate stages.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Socketed into a $(l:magic/crystal_apothecary)Crystal Apothecary$(/l) converts the geode's energy directly into Ink, allowing it to be transmitted via $(l:magic/ink_duct)Ink Ducts$(/l).
